content: the first double_crochet then the 3 double_crochet s crocheted together yo insert hook in 4th chain from hook yo pull up a loop twice 2 loops on hook yo insert hook in next chain yo pull up a loop twice 3 loops on hook yo insert hook in next chain yo pull up a loop twice 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops 3 double_crochet decrease complete chain 5 3 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook finish off bow tie with pink chain 6 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in each of 4 remaining chs finish off wrap tie around the middle of the bow and sew the ends of tie together overlapping if necessary securely sew bow to head with brown or black stitch on face and peanut texture detail note holding the two body pieces exactly matched up as you crochet helps to keep them even with each other this way you can see the matching stitches and single_crochet them together single_crochet the two body pieces together leaving a small opening for stuffing stuff lightly it s supposed to be fairly flat finish sewing pieces together finish off weave in any loose ends enjoy your peanut or give her to a loved one ♥
